entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
